mapper.select: WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} AND del_flag = '0'

del_flag = '0'
AND dept_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{deptName}, '%')
AND status = #{status}
AND parent_id = #{parentId}
AND leader LIKE CONCAT('%', #{leader}, '%')
AND phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')
AND email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
AND date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
ORDER BY order_num ASC, create_time DESC
WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND del_flag = '0' AND status = '0' ORDER BY order_num ASC, create_time ASC
WHERE (parent_id = 0 OR parent_id IS NULL) AND del_flag = '0' AND status = '0' ORDER BY order_num ASC, create_time ASC
WHERE leader_user_id = #{leaderUserId} AND del_flag = '0' AND status = '0' ORDER BY order_num ASC, create_time ASC

WHERE del_flag = '0' AND status = '0'
AND (parent_id = 0 OR parent_id IS NULL)
AND ancestors IS NOT NULL AND ancestors != '' AND LENGTH(ancestors) - LENGTH(REPLACE(ancestors, ',', '')) = #{level} - 2
ORDER BY order_num ASC, create_time ASC

WHERE del_flag = '0' AND status = '0'
AND (ancestors = #{ancestors} OR ancestors LIKE CONCAT(#{ancestors}, ',%') OR ancestors LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{ancestors}) OR ancestors LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{ancestors}, ',%'))
ORDER BY order_num ASC, create_time ASC

WHERE del_flag = '0' AND status = '0' AND (dept_id = #{deptId} OR FIND_IN_SET(#{deptId}, ancestors) > 0 OR FIND_IN_SET(dept_id, (SELECT ancestors FROM sys_dept WHERE dept_id = #{deptId})) > 0) ORDER BY order_num ASC, create_time ASC
SELECT dept_id FROM sys_dept WHERE del_flag = '0' AND ( dept_id = #{deptId} OR FIND_IN_SET(#{deptId}, ancestors) > 0 ) ORDER BY level ASC, order_num ASC, dept_id ASC
SELECT dept_id FROM sys_dept WHERE del_flag = '0' AND status = '0' ORDER BY order_num ASC, create_time ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM sys_dept WHERE del_flag = '0' AND (dept_id = #{parentId} AND FIND_IN_SET(#{parentId}, ancestors) > 0) AND (dept_id = #{deptId} AND FIND_IN_SET(#{deptId}, ancestors) > 0)

WHERE del_flag = '0' AND status = '0' AND dept_type = '3' AND parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY order_num
